100458.<start_lip_sync n03560 _normal m00001>「グ:

100459.<start_lip_sync n03560 _normal m00001>「な:

100460.<start_lip_sync n03560 _normal m00001>「だ:

100461.<start_lip_sync n03560 _normal m00001>「な:

100462.<start_lip_sync n03560 _normal m00001>「そ:

100463.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「た: <start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>I'm home. Oh, you are.<stop_lip_animation n03561 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100468.<start_lip_sync n03560 _normal m00001>「う:

100469.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「…: <start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>Don't make me laugh.<stop_lip_animation n03561 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100471.<shake_camera 28><start_lip_sync n03561: <shake_camera 28><start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>Don't make me laugh!<stop_lip_animation n03561 CLOSE_MOUTH>

100475.<start_lip_sync n03560 _normal m00001>「ふ:
